Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Harper
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Dorchester, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Harper.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with delays due to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff is working to run service as frequently and evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
